statements: SELECT * FROM music_sales_data WHERE sale_id = 1;
SELECT artist_name, genre, sale_amount FROM music_sales_data WHERE genre = 'Pop' ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT album_name, artist_name, sales_quantity FROM music_sales_data WHERE sales_quantity > 100 ORDER BY sales_quantity ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT genre FROM music_sales_data;
SELECT sale_date, sale_amount FROM music_sales_data WHERE artist_name = 'Taylor Swift' AND genre = 'Pop';
SELECT * FROM music_sales_data WHERE genre = 'Pop' ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT artist_name, SUM(sales_quantity) AS total_sales FROM music_sales_data GROUP BY artist_name ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT album_name, artist_name, sale_amount FROM music_sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND sales_quantity > 100 ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM music_sales_data WHERE genre IN ('Rock', 'Hip Hop') AND artist_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY sale_date ASC, sale_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT artist_name, COUNT(DISTINCT genre) AS unique_genres FROM music_sales_data GROUP BY artist_name HAVING unique_genres > 1 ORDER BY unique_genres DESC, artist_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM music_sales;
SELECT artist_name, album_name, units_sold FROM music_sales WHERE units_sold > 100;
SELECT date, artist_name, units_sold FROM music_sales WHERE artist_name = 'Taylor Swift';
SELECT genre, units_requested FROM market_demand ORDER BY units_requested DESC;
SELECT * FROM music_sales WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM music_sales WHERE units_sold > 100 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT artist_name, album_name, units_sold FROM music_sales WHERE artist_name='Taylor Swift'
SELECT date, artist_name, album_name FROM music_sales WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT artist_name, SUM(units_sold) AS total_units_sold FROM music_sales GROUP BY artist_name ORDER BY total_units_sold DESC
SELECT genre, AVG(units_requested) AS average_demand FROM market_demand GROUP BY genre
SELECT * FROM music_sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT artist, album_title, units_sold FROM music_sales WHERE units_sold > 1000;
SELECT artist, album_title, sale_date FROM music_sales WHERE artist = 'Ed Sheeran';
SELECT region_name, country, city, postal_code FROM sales_regions WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM sales_trends WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM music_sales WHERE artist = 'John Doe';
SELECT album_title, units_sold FROM music_sales WHERE units_sold > 100;
SELECT artist, sale_date FROM music_sales WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM sales_regions WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY city ASC;
SELECT trend_name, start_date, end_date FROM sales_trends WHERE trend_description LIKE '%best-selling%' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM music_sales_data;
SELECT album_name, release_date FROM albums ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT artist_name, country FROM artists WHERE country='USA';
SELECT sale_id, album_id, sale_amount FROM music_sales_data WHERE sale_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT region_name, sales_total FROM sales_regions WHERE sales_total > 1000 ORDER BY sales_total DESC;
SELECT * FROM music_sales_data LEFT JOIN albums ON music_sales_data.album_id = albums.album_id;
SELECT * FROM music_sales_data JOIN artists ON albums.artist_id = artists.artist_id;
SELECT album_name, artist_name FROM albums JOIN artists ON albums.artist_id = artists.artist_id;
SELECT sale_date, sale_amount FROM music_sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 100;
SELECT artist_name, country FROM artists WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM music_sales;
SELECT song_name, artist_name, sale_amount FROM music_sales WHERE sale_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 10;
SELECT album_name, genre, release_date FROM albums ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT artist_name, genre, debut_year FROM artists WHERE genre = 'Rock';
SELECT * FROM music_sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC, sale_amount ASC;
SELECT artist_name, sale_amount FROM music_sales WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM artists WHERE genre = 'Pop' OR genre = 'Rock' ORDER BY debut_year;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT artist_name, total_sales FROM sales_reports WHERE total_sales > 50000 ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
